decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 100 rev A, 200 rev A, 201 rev B, 300 rev A, 301 rev B, 400 rev A; Cover Letter (ref. CTIL/TEF 70792) and Supplementary Information sheet from Sitec Infrastructure Services Ltd (both dated 25/09/2019); ICNIRP Compliance declaration (ref. CTIL 149027/TEF 70792) from Cornerstone & Telefonica UK Ltd dated 03/09/2019; General Background Information sheet and Design and Access Statement (both dated 11/03/2019); Heritage Statement (ref. CTIL 149027/TEF 70792).

Reason:
For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 4 - All external apparatus and equipment hereby approved, including any cables or trunking, shall be grey in colour.
 
Reason: In order to minimize the impact on the appearance of the building and local environment in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - The apparatus hereby approved shall be removed from the building as soon as reasonably practicable when no longer required.  
 
Reason: In order to minimize the impact on the appearance of the building and local environment in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Installation of 3 telecommunication equipment cabinets in rear yard for use in connection with an existing microcell antenna on front elevation of building.
